0.2.name: wordpress/link-to-post
0.2.description:
This plugin permits you to easily create a link to an existing content of your site. It adds a button to the tinymce and quicktags editors, which list the existing articles, pages, category, tags.

Languages :

  • English (en_US)
  • Français (fr_FR)
  • Беларуская (be_BY) : Fatcow
  • Polska (pl_PL) : Edward Jaszke
  • Deutsch (de_DE) : Oliver C. Jung
  • Eesti (et_ET) : Illimar
  • Lietuviškai (lt_LT) : Xawiers
  • Español (es_ES) : Núria Ramoneda
  • Català (ca) : Núria Ramoneda
  • Português (pt) : André Mafei
  • Nederlands (nl_NL) : Mmo
